md:
giải nghĩa từ "spotty" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Spotty (adjective) - có vết, có đốm
	+ Example: The spotty dog ran around the park.
	+ Related words: spot, spotty skin, spotty face

* Spotty (noun) - người có vết, người có đốm
	+ Example: The spotty kid in my class is very shy.
	+ Related words: spot, acne, pimple

Note: In Vietnamese, "spotty" can be translated to "có vết" or "có đốm", depending on the context. In the first example, "spotty" is used to describe a dog with spots, so the translation is "có vết". In the second example, "spotty" is used to describe a person with acne or pimples, so the translation is also "có vết" or "có đốm".

  • Spotty (adjective) - có vết, có đốm

  • Spotty (noun) - người có vết, người có đốm

    • Example: The spotty kid in my class is very shy.
    • Related words: spot, acne, pimple

Note: In Vietnamese, "spotty" can be translated to "có vết" or "có đốm", depending on the context. In the first example, "spotty" is used to describe a dog with spots, so the translation is "có vết". In the second example, "spotty" is used to describe a person with acne or pimples, so the translation is also "có vết" or "có đốm".
